dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3547 EAS:
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

engrossed-amendment-form.current-chamber: In the Senate of the United States,

section.text: That the bill from the House of Representatives (H.R. 3547) entitled An Act to extend the application of certain space launch liability provisions through 2014., do pass with the following

amendment-instruction.text: Strike all after the enacting clause and insert the following:

section.text: Section 50915(f) of title 51, United States Code, is amended by striking December 31, 2013 and inserting December 31, 2016.

title-amends.official-title-amendment: Amend the title so as to read: A bill to extend Government liability, subject to appropriation, for certain third-party claims arising from commercial space launches..
